  • Method Details

    • stopCondition

      private static boolean stopCondition(DataPoint[] oldCentroids, DataPoint[] newCentroids, int nIterations, int maxIterations, float threshold)
      Checks if the algorithm has reached the stop condition
      Parameters:
      oldCentroids - centroids of the previous iteration
      newCentroids - centroid of this iteration
      nIterations - number of iteration the algorithm has done
      maxIterations - maximum number of iteration before the end of the algorithm
      threshold - value of distance we want to reach in order to end the algorithm
      Returns:
      true: the algorithm is over, false: the algorithm continues with another iteration

    • countLines

      private static int countLines(String filename) throws IOException
      Counts the number of lines of the input file
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of input file
      Returns:
      the number of lines, or 1 if the file is empty
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initializeCentroids

      private static void initializeCentroids(int k, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inputFile) throws IOException
      Initialize centroids for first Job iteration
      Parameters:
      k - is the number of centroids
      inputFile - is the file containing the starting dataset
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readCentroids

      private static DataPoint[] readCentroids(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String outputFile, int k) throws IOException
      Read the centroids from the latest iteration, with the objective to compare these centroids with the older ones
      Parameters:
      conf - the configuration variable
      outputFile - the output file of the latest iteration, in which the job prints the centroids
      k - the centroids number
      Returns:
      the set of centroids read on the outputFile
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeFinalOutput

      private static void writeFinalOutput(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String outputFile) throws IOException
      Write the set of centroids of the last job (after reaching the stop condition) on a file
      Parameters:
      conf - configuration variable
      outputFile - file where write the last centroids
      Throws:
      IOException
